citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
08-Nov-17.
USDA arrived to a closed gate at the facility. The provided contact number was called and a message was left.
Waited at the facility for 30 minutes and a response was not received.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
08-Nov-17.
USDA arrived to a closed gate at the facility. The provided contact number was called and a message was left.
Waited at the facility for 30 minutes and a response was not received.
